Landing.heroTitle:
Orchestrate AI Agents
with Surgical Precision
Landing.heroDescription: Jarvis is the advanced orchestration platform for managing autonomous multi-agent systems. Deploy, monitor, and scale your AI workforce.
Landing.featuresDescription: Everything you need to manage complex agent swarms without losing track.
Landing.feature1Desc: Run multiple agent chains simultaneously with our optimized specialized workers.
Landing.feature2Desc: Shared memory architecture allows agents to access project-wide context instantly.
Landing.feature3Desc: Secure execution environments ensure your system stays safe while agents work.

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, {name}. System is fully operational.
